attributes.action: Stop Powys Highways destroying Wildlife habitats with unnecessary mowing and strimming.
attributes.additional_details: Stop Powys Highways dept destroying wildlife habitats by excessive mowing and strimming at Sarn- Y - Bryn Caled Welshpool. The verges which do not border the road and are adjacent to a Montgomeryshire Wildlife Trust reserve were full of wildflowers,butterflies,insects,bees,bird life of which I have photographic evidence. It is now been destroyed by mowing and strimming along the hedgerows and verges.
